thread.title: Nice hotel in Paris -
thread.title_full: Nice hotel in Paris - Review of Holiday Inn Paris-St. Germain Des Pres, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Marc N
title: Nice hotel in Paris -
text:
Nice hotel about 2 kilometers from the river Seine and the Louvre. Superior rooms are on top floor and are well lit and spacious. Hotel has its own car parking, but rather pricy at 18 euro per day. I will definitely reconsider this hotel for my next visit to Paris.
Room Tip: Ask for a superior room See more room tips
